title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2203.2 - Concurrent use of awards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2203.2 - Concurrent use of awards

State Regulations

An academic performance award may not be held concurrently
with any other award or benefit deemed duplicative pursuant to section
145-1.11
of this Title. Candidates
for academic performance awards who will receive an award or benefit of the
type prohibited by section
145-1.11
of this Title, after
acceptance of an academic performance award and filing of a payment
application, shall notify the corporation immediately and shall be responsible
for the repayment of any monies previously paid in error. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2203.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
